trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref> to use with a class.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref>用于类。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When you create a component that you want to license, you must specify the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> by marking the component with a LicenseProviderAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 当创建一个组件，你想要授予许可，你必须指定<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>标记 LicenseProviderAttribute 的组件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute.LicenseProvider%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute.LicenseProvider%2A>要获取<xref:System.Type>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider></xref:System.Type>属性</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute.LicenseProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关许可的详细信息，请参阅[How to︰ 许可证组件和控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>特性应用于此类具有以下<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>属性值︰ <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>不影响桌面应用程序 （通常通过双击图标、 键入命令，或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动）。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref> class without a license provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref>没有许可证提供程序的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref> class with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref>具有指定类型的类。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the license provider class.
trans-unit.target: 许可证提供程序类的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref> class with the specified type of license provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref>与许可证提供程序的指定类型的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of the license provider class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>表示类型的许可证提供程序类。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value, which is no provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认值，该值是没有提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示此实例与指定的对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Another object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: if value is equal to this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 等于此实例; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当前的哈希代码<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the license provider that must be used with the associated class.
trans-unit.target: 获取必须与关联的类一起使用的许可证提供程序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of the license provider.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示许可提供程序的类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates a unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 指示此特性类型的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: A unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 此特性类型唯一 ID。
